section.name: Introduction
section.p: The Astrogrid Datacenter Server, PAL, relies upon the following software components which must be installed and configured before installing the Datacenter Server.

section.name: Java Virtual Machine
section.p: Requires Java (J2SE) version 1.4 or higher. Available from http://java.sun.com/j2se/downloads.html

body.section:
PAL requires a web service manager to present itself to the web. We have used and tested it with Tomcat.
Requires version 4.1 or later. Available from http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/; Installation instructions http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.1-doc/RUNNING.txt. Other servlet containers should work, provided they support version 2.2 of the Servlets Spec.
Set shell variable CATALINA_HOME to the root of your tomcat installation, as described in the installation instructions.
If your web service manager does not include Axis, you will need to download this from here, and install it as a web application in your manager - instructions are here.
